title: Italian farm family
brief_description: A glimpse of life in Italy during the late sixties in the farming area near Mt. Vesuvius. Shows the day to day life of the Falco family: the sowing and reaping of the crops, bread baking in the home and the many tasks undertaken by various members of the family. Also shown is the community life in the area.
